name: Turn The Lights Off!
description:
'Turn The Lights Off!' is a simple 2D game created for Brackeys GameJam 2018. 
Your task is prevent your grandchildren from turning lights in your house! In order to do that, you can use your special powers to grab/pull kids, and throw them away! If you throw them far enough (to one of black pits), you will be rewarded with a special power up potion!

CONTROLS:
Player1: 'WSAD' to move around, 'H' to pull/throw kids, 'J' to jump.
Player2: Arrow keys to move around, num1 to pull/throw kids, num2 to jump.
Have fun!


*Changes after end of gamejam*
First version had audio disabled. 'AudioSource' gameobject now is enabled (in inspector)
